00002 #include "Lgm/LgmVec.h"

00004 /*
00005  * Given vectors a and b, compute the cross product, c.
00006  */
00007 void Lgm_CrossProduct(Lgm_Vector *a, Lgm_Vector *b, Lgm_Vector *c) {
00008 
00009     c->x = (a->y * b->z) - (a->z * b->y);
00010     c->y = (a->z * b->x) - (a->x * b->z);
00011     c->z = (a->x * b->y) - (a->y * b->x);
00012 }
00013 
00014 
00015 /*
00016  * Given vectors a and b, compute and return the dot product
00017  */
00018 double Lgm_DotProduct(Lgm_Vector *a, Lgm_Vector *b) {
00019     return(a->x * b->x + a->y * b->y + a->z * b->z);
00020 }
00021 
00022 
00023 /*
00024  * Normalize the given vector. I.e. make it into a unit vector.
00025  * plus return magnitude since you already have it! 
00026  */
00027 double Lgm_NormalizeVector(Lgm_Vector *a) {
00028     double magnitude, inv;
00029 
00030     magnitude = sqrt((a->x * a->x) + (a->y * a->y) + (a->z * a->z));
00031     if (magnitude > 0.0) {
00032         inv = 1.0/magnitude;
00033         a->x *= inv;
00034         a->y *= inv;
00035         a->z *= inv;
00036         return(magnitude);
00037     } else {
00038         return(-1.0);
00039     }
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 /* 
00044  * multiply the given vector by a scalar value
00045  */
00046 void Lgm_ScaleVector(Lgm_Vector *a, double value) {
00047     a->x *= value;
00048     a->y *= value;
00049     a->z *= value;
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 /* 
00054  * return the magnitude of a vector
00055  */
00056 double Lgm_Magnitude( Lgm_Vector *a) {
00057     return( sqrt((a->x * a->x) + (a->y * a->y) + (a->z * a->z)) );
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 /* 
00062  * makes the given vector have a magnitude of mag
00063  */
00064 void Lgm_ForceMagnitude(Lgm_Vector *a, double mag) {
00065     Lgm_NormalizeVector(a);
00066     Lgm_ScaleVector(a, mag);
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 /*
00071  *  Routine to compute A dot V
00072  *    double A[3][3];         -- Trans Matrix
00073  *    Lgm_Vector *V;              -- Lgm_Vector
00074  *    Lgm_Vector *Result;         -- the result of the product
00075  */
00076 void Lgm_MatTimesVec(double A[3][3], Lgm_Vector *V, Lgm_Vector *Result) {
00077     Result->x = A[0][0]*V->x + A[1][0]*V->y + A[2][0]*V->z;
00078     Result->y = A[0][1]*V->x + A[1][1]*V->y + A[2][1]*V->z;
00079     Result->z = A[0][2]*V->x + A[1][2]*V->y + A[2][2]*V->z;
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 
00084 /*  
00085  *   Multiply two matrices together 
00086  *          Result = A * B
00087  */
00088 void Lgm_MatTimeMat( double A[3][3], double B[3][3], double Result[3][3] ) {
00089 
00090     int i, j;
00091 
00092     for (j=0; j<3; ++j){
00093         for (i=0; i<3; ++i){
00094             Result[i][j] = A[0][j]*B[i][0] + A[1][j]*B[i][1] + A[2][j]*B[i][2];
00095         }
00096     }
00097 
00098 }
